Sentencas: A study is conducted on a cogeneration system that incorporates a natural gas fed internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell (IRSOFC) and a zeolite/water adsorption chiller (AC).
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: The main aim is to investigate the performance of this combined system under different operating conditions and design parameters.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: A mathematical model is developed to simulate the combined system under steady-state conditions.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: The effects of fuel flow rate, fuel utilization factor, circulation ratio, mass of adsorbent and inlet air temperature on the performance are considered.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: The results show that the proposed IRSOFC-AC cogeneration system can achieve a total efficiency (combined electrical power and cooling power) of more than 77%.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency is found to decrease as the fuel flow rate increases, while the cooling power increases to a constant value.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: The total efficiency reaches a maximum value with variation of the fuel utilization factor.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system

Sentencas: Both the circulation ratio and the inlet air temperature exert positive impacts on system efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system
Numerical study of an internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell and adsorption chiller co-generation system
